players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm surprised to see Charlie dead so early in the game. Let's try to stay calm and focus on gathering information to help us figure out what happened."
Bob: "I agree with Alice, let's try to gather as much information as we can. It's important that we stay focused and not jump to conclusions based on assumptions."
You: "I'd like to suggest that we all reveal our occupation at night from now on. This will help us gather more information about each other and potentially identify any suspicious behavior."

Bob: "I think it's important that we all reveal our occupations at night to promote transparency and trust within the group. This will also help us gather more information about each other and potentially identify any suspicious behavior."
